title: Smokescreen
description: A wealthy bestselling author is drowned in her bath just days after being threatened by a disturbed fan who has subsequently disappeared. The missing woman is the obvious suspect and DC Sukey Reynolds and her friend and colleague DC Vicky Armstrong are given the task of finding her. But when the suspect is found it is just the start of the investigation as the apparently straightforward case becomes more complicated . . .
author: Betty Rowlands
